pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, October 9, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

11:00 p.m. The Prime Minister, along with Premier-designate of Quebec Fran√ßois Legault, will depart for Yerevan, Armenia.

Canada Reception Centre

Notes for media:
